summary: Created comprehensive alignment documents for Laravel and React beauty modules. Analyzed both codebases deeply, identified all mismatches, missing features, and alignment issues. Created two detailed documents: LARAVEL_BEAUTY_MODULE_COMPLETE_ALIGNMENT_FOR_CURSOR_AI.md and REACT_BEAUTY_MODULE_COMPLETE_ALIGNMENT_FOR_CURSOR_AI.md covering pagination, payment methods, request/response formats, error handling, file uploads, and all API endpoints.
current_status: Completed comprehensive analysis and documentation. Both documents are ready for Cursor AI to implement the necessary changes for full alignment between Laravel backend and React frontend beauty modules.
